channel.title: Need a banking powerminer
channel.description:
I need a power miner that mines coal, iron, gold, adamentite, runite, and mithrilite. Anti-Ban, and all the stuff to make it work. If I could be sent the scar program os I could use it it would make me very happy :). If I get it I can only pay in stuff from my runescape account, like a mapble bow or sumthing.
-TheDestroyer.

item.title: Need a banking powerminer
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

The defenition of a “powerminer” is a miner that drops the ores so there is no such thing as a “banking powerminer” lol.

But, there are soem good mining + banking scripts out there, just look around.
http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/mining-f192.html

Read full topic
